title: Club Tag
body: Unable to show club tag, not the owner, club tag created and other members showing it but I am unable, it's greyed out.

replies.body: It's interesting to hear that it's grayed out, and we'd like to take a closer look to see what's going on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you directly, and be sure to include the club name and tag in your ticket.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
